programme.desc: Rob joins Stephen Mulhern as he goes toe-to-toe with the Banker and tries to come out on top while avoiding becoming a member of the infamous 1p Club.

programme.desc: All that stands between Carol-Anne from Liverpool, Jim from Didcot, Rhys from Bristol, Eve from Belfast and thousands of pounds is the small matter of one of the Chasers.

programme.desc: David and Shona conceal their deepest fears from one another as they prepare to meet with a consultant about their unborn babys condition, and Will lies to Ben and Eva.

programme.desc: Documentary. Follow the investigation into the heartbreaking death of Nikitta Grender and the extensive police work that brought her killer to justice.
